abstract: Calvin Anele Ngcongca (born 21 October 1987), known as Anele Ngcongca, is a South African football player who currently plays for Belgian Jupiler League club Racing Genk. Ngcongca left South Africa without having played top-flight football domestically.
comment: Calvin Anele Ngcongca (born 21 October 1987), known as Anele Ngcongca, is a South African football player who currently plays for Belgian Jupiler League club Racing Genk. Ngcongca left South Africa without having played top-flight football domestically.
